message: I'm excited to offer you this amazing product at a special price of $180. It's a great deal considering its value to you is $120!
Thanks for the offer, Alice! I'm really interested, but $180 is a bit out of my budget.  Would you be willing to consider $120? That's the maximum I can afford right now.

I understand you're on a tight budget, Bob, but I still need to make a profit. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll offer it to you for $160. It's a fair price considering the value you place on it.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice.  $160 is still a little more than I'm comfortable paying. How about $140?  It's a good compromise for both of us.
I'm getting closer to your budget, Bob, but I still need to make a profit. I'll meet you at $155, which is the lowest I can go. It's a good compromise, and I'm confident you'll love the product!
